mapper.insert: insert into alerts (AL_ID, USER_ID, PRODUCT_ID, AL_COUNT, CHECKED_FLAG, P_NAME, AL_MESSAGE, AL_CREATE_AT) SELECT al_id_seq.nextval, max_bids.USER_ID, max_bids.PRODUCTS_ID, (select (nvl(max(AL_COUNT), 0) + 1) from ALERTS where user_id = max_bids.USER_ID), 0, P_NAME, p.P_NAME || '이(가) 낙찰 되었습니다', sysdate FROM USERS u JOIN PRODUCTS p ON u.USER_ID = p.USER_ID JOIN (SELECT b.USER_ID, b.PRODUCTS_ID, max(b.AMOUNT) as max_bid FROM BIDS b JOIN PRODUCTS p on p.PRODUCT_ID = b.PRODUCTS_ID where b.AMOUNT is not null and p.P_SALES_STATUS = 3 GROUP BY b.PRODUCTS_ID, b.USER_ID) max_bids ON p.PRODUCT_ID = max_bids.PRODUCTS_ID;

insert into alerts (AL_ID, USER_ID, PRODUCT_ID, AL_COUNT, CHECKED_FLAG, P_NAME, AL_MESSAGE, AL_CREATE_AT) select al_id_seq.nextval, USER_ID, PRODUCT_ID, (select NVL(max(AL_COUNT), 0) from ALERTS al where al.USER_ID = p.USER_ID)+1, 0, p.P_NAME, p.P_NAME || '이(가) 경매에 실패하였습니다.', sysdate from PRODUCTS p where P_SALES_STATUS = 4;
mapper.update: update ALERTS set CHECKED_FLAG = 1, AL_COUNT = 0 where AL_ID = #{0};
